Description.Text:
Position Hotel Berenice is situated in a perfect position at 150 mt from the beach and near the centre of Rimini.
Restaurant
Outside
Lobby
More Informations Last refurbishment in 2005. Sweet and salty buffet breakfast. At meals: choice between 2 menu with mixed buffet, fruit or dessert.
Accepted credit cards: Eurocard/Mastercard + Visa.
Unguarded parking with limited availability, situated at 100 meters from Hotel, with supplement to pay on spot.
The treatment ALL INCLUSIVE includes: drinks during meals (1/2 l. water and 1/4 l. wine per person per meal) + beach service with 1 sun umbrella and 2 sun beds per room.
Check IN: from 12.00. (midday). Check OUT: until 10.00 am.
